clinical_history: Patient with bone pain and prior cancer history.
findings: Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in spleen with SUVmax 9.96.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Mild inflammatory uptake in spleen region.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
recommendations: Consider lab tests to assess metabolic activity if indicated.
